name: Association of European Journalists
membership:
Observer status at Council of Europe Steering Committee on Media and Information Society, CDMSI, since 2008
Member of the CoE platform for alert on Press Freedom
goal: Promoting free, independent and high quality journalism and media in Europe, safeguarding the welfare of journalists as professionals, engaging with EU institutions and bodies for the above goals, and promoting the AEJ as a network for sharing knowledge, skills and mutual support of members
interests: Budget, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: Everything on media freedom, protection of sources of journalists and fight against violence perpetrated on journalists while doing their job, innovation in media (technological and media literacy).
